name: humiliatingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes someone feel ashamed or stupid: Don't worry too much; there are always a million things that can go horribly, humiliatingly wrong. The army was humiliatingly driven out, thus suffering its first defeat since 1956.
More examplesFewer examplesThat final goal meant the scoreline read, humiliatingly, 0–8.He was humiliatingly ejected from the White House.The rescue operation humiliatingly failed when two helicopters crashed into the desert.The team's appearance in the competition was humiliatingly brief.
